zero_p0_errors.detail: 0 P0 errors across all 8 paths. All non-suppressed errors are Velo ModuleLoadError (classified under velo_worker check).

all_critical_selectors_visible.detail: home: hero section visible (h1 'Empowering CDL Drivers'); upload_docs: upload form and CDL upload button visible; ai_matcher: #ai-matching-container with full search form, AI assistant, and voice call UI all visible via iframe snapshot.

all_pages_reached_ready_state.detail: 7/8 passed. FAILED: drivers - wait_for 'Truck Drivers' timed out after 20000ms. Page rendered fully (snapshot confirmed content) but readyText not found as visible text (nav shows 'TRUCK DRIVERS' in all-caps which may not match mixed-case search).

zero_network_500_errors.detail: 0 LMDR-specific network requests with status >= 500 across all 8 paths. All failed requests (403s on /v1/bulk/report-exposures, blog-settings 304) are Wix-internal and excluded by EXCLUDE allowlist.

screenshots_captured.detail: 8/8 screenshots captured. All files > 10KB: home.png (521KB), about.png (814KB), privacy.png (222KB), drivers.png (634KB), upload_docs.png (428KB), pricing.png (341KB), insights.png (200KB), ai_matcher.png (231KB).

zero_velo_worker_fatal_errors.detail: 8 Velo ModuleLoadError instances across 4 paths: home (3: recent placements, platform stats, featured carriers), about (2: impact stats, partner logos), drivers (2: job highlights, recent hires), pricing (1: platform stats). All match /ModuleLoadError/i pattern.

drivers.notes: wait_for 'Truck Drivers' timed out - page content rendered fully per a11y snapshot but readyText match failed (likely case sensitivity: nav shows 'TRUCK DRIVERS' uppercase)

upload_docs.notes: PostMessage bridge operational (quickApplyFormReady -> pageReady). nonDestructive=true - no submit buttons clicked.

consoleErrors.message: Failed to load platform stats: ModuleLoadError: Error: Unable to handle the request. Contact the site administrator or view site monitoring logs for more information.

insights.notes: Generic 403 resource load errors (msgid 114, 115) are not Velo-specific and are Wix-internal resource failures, not LMDR application errors.

ai_matcher.notes: iframe AI_MATCHING fully loaded. PostMessage bridge verified: carrierMatchingReady -> pageReady -> ping -> pong -> CONNECTION VERIFIED. Voice agent (VAPI SDK) loaded. AI chat assistant rendered.

action_items.title: Fix ModuleLoadError on 4 pages (home, about, drivers, pricing)
action_items.detail: Backend modules fail to load with 'Unable to handle the request' across: home (recent placements, platform stats, featured carriers), about (impact stats, partner logos), drivers (job highlights, recent hires), pricing (platform stats). These are Velo backend function resolution failures - check that all referenced .jsw exports exist and are properly deployed.

action_items.title: Update readyText for drivers page
action_items.detail: The wait_for 'Truck Drivers' times out because the navigation shows 'TRUCK DRIVERS' in uppercase. Either update the evidence-pack config to use 'TRUCK DRIVERS' or add case-insensitive matching. The page itself renders correctly.
